Name: UED Beacon
Description: UED engineering vehicle. Can be deployed at a specified site in order to calldown Operation Headquarters from orbit.

Production.Description:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Capable of deploying all UED structures aside from additional Operation Headquarters.

Enables:
- Salvagers
- Beacons
Production.Name: Operation Headquarters

Production.Description: Calldown onto a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
Production.Name: Vespene Purification Plant

Production.Description:
Universal production structure for the Directorate army, capable of deploying any combat units.

Enables:
- Garmrs
- Strike Troopers
- Enrichment Towers
Production.Name: Teleportation Node

Production.Description:
Provides Logistics Capacity.
Logistics allow you to deploy additional units.
Can be transformed into a variety of defense towers.
Production.Name: Arsenal

Production.Description:
Infantry support structure. Provides equipment authorizations and unlocks research projects that enhance all infantry units.

Enables:
- Taranises
- Lazaruses
- Drakkar APCs
- Defense Towers
Production.Name: Tactics Academy

Production.Description:
Advanced upgrade structure. Unlocks various equipment authorizations for spacecraft & vehicles.

Enables:
- Peenemunde MRLS
- Citadel AAT
Production.Name: Military Research Station

Production.Description:
Long-range communications array. Provides equipment authorizations for the Directorate Navy assets.

Enables:
- Honorguards
Production.Name: Tachyon Relay

Production.Description:
Starship support structure. Provides equipment authorizations for basic vessels.

Enables:
- Crimson Eyes
- Strikefighters
- Valkyries
- Transport Shuttles
- Support Shuttles
Production.Name: Starship Maintenance Plant

Production.Description:
Vehicle support structure. Provides equipment authorizations for basic vehicles.

Enables:
- Crimson Eyes
- Sentinel MBT
- Typhoon LMT
Production.Name: Munitions Factory

Production.Description:
An upgrade structure that supports Political Advisors.

Enables:
- Political Advisors
Production.Name: Field Bureau

Production.Description:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Capable of deploying all UED structures aside from additional Operation Headquarters.

Enables:
- Salvagers
- Beacons
Production.Name: Operation Headquarters

Commands.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Commands.Name: Move

Commands.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Commands.Name: Stop

Commands.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Commands.Name: Hold Position

Commands.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Commands.Name: Patrol

Commands.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Commands.Name: Attack

Commands.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Capable of deploying all UED structures aside from additional Operation Headquarters.

Enables:
- Salvagers
- Beacons
Commands.Name: Calldown Operation Headquarters

Commands.Name: Cancel
